channel.title: Java :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Resources JUnit 5 Assertions Hamcrest Matchers Gradle Changes In the build.gradle file, the JUnit 5 parameters library was added: dependencies { // Use JUnit Jupiter API for testing. testImplementation 'org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-api:5.6.2', 'org.hamcrest:hamcrest:2.2', 'org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-params' // Use JUnit Jupiter Engine for testing. testRuntimeOnly 'org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine' // This dependency is used by the application. implementation 'com.google.guava:guava:29.0-jre' } Also, we added a quick section at the bottom to allow Gradle tasks to read input from System.
